thread.title: Before you bring out your selfie stick – find out if it is banned
thread.title_full: Before you bring out your selfie stick – find out if it is banned

author: Steven Zussino
title: Before you bring out your selfie stick – find out if it is banned
text:
E-mail 
I was just recently in New York City and selfie sticks were everywhere! An online ticket company, AttractionTix.co.uk, has just launched a brand new venture, CanIBringMySelfieStick.com , a website that provides all the answers to where selfie sticks can and cannot be used. Using a handy grid format, it’s easy to see that you can’t bring it to the Brooklyn Museum! Personally, I find them intrusive!
